tickets.title: Delete or fix 30 failing legacy test suites
tickets.description: 63 tests fail across 30 suites. Most are from the pre-Phaser legacy code (hooks/useGameEngine, hooks/useTerrainSystem, hooks/useVillagerSystem, systems/GestureRecognizer, systems/MiracleSystem, utils/AStar, utils/TerrainGenerator, utils/ZoomControl, etc). These legacy systems have been replaced by Phaser equivalents in src/phaser/. Audit each failing suite: if the system it tests has been replaced by a working Phaser system, delete the legacy test file AND the legacy source file. If the system is still needed (e.g. MiracleSystem, GestureRecognizer), fix the failing tests. Target: 0 failing tests on main.

tickets.title: Delete dead legacy code (pre-Phaser systems)
tickets.description: Deleted all 22 legacy files: 12 from src/systems/, 3 from src/utils/, 7 from src/components/. All were dead code only referenced by their own tests.

tickets.title: Merge dev branch features (Menu + Pause) to main
tickets.description: Merged. MainMenuScene and Pause Menu working on main.

tickets.title: Fix GameContainer to use Phaser scenes for game flow
tickets.description: Already done. App.jsx renders PhaserGame directly. GameContainer removed. Flow: MainMenuScene -> MainScene.

tickets.title: Wire up TopBar to Phaser scene events
tickets.description: Superseded. TopBar.jsx deleted. Replaced by Phaser-native HUD text showing time, belief, population, worshipping/sleeping counts.

tickets.title: Implement belief point resource system
tickets.description: Done. Belief generates from worshipping villagers at 1/sec each. Stored on PlayerSystem, spent via divine powers. Displayed in HUD.

tickets.title: Implement population tracking and food system
tickets.description: Done. Food resource on PlayerSystem (starts at 50). Farms generate 2 food/sec. Villagers consume 0.5 food/day. When food=0, villagers move at 60% speed (STARVING in HUD). Food displayed in HUD alongside belief.

tickets.title: Implement day/night cycle with game clock
tickets.description: Done. GameClock with 60s days, graduated darkness overlay, dawn/dusk transitions. Villagers return to temple and sleep at night, wake at dawn.

tickets.title: Create TempleSystem with placement and rendering
tickets.description: Done. 80px temples with player colors, influence aura circles (60-tile radius), cross markers. TempleSystem manages all temple entities.

tickets.title: Implement villager worship behaviour
tickets.description: Done. Villagers pathfind to temple (40% chance when idle near temple), worship for 6s generating 1 belief/sec, then return to idle. Pulsing alpha visual feedback.

tickets.title: Add villager state machine (idle, wander, worship, work, flee)
tickets.description: Done. States: idle, moving, worshipping, sleeping. Villagers wander, worship at temples, sleep at night. Visual feedback per state (pulsing for worship, dim for sleep).

tickets.title: Villager spawning from temples
tickets.description: Done. Temples spawn villagers every 30s (first at 15s). Pop cap: 20 per temple level. Villagers spawn at passable tiles near temple.

tickets.title: Implement Heal divine power
tickets.description: Done. Heal (20 belief, 5 tile radius, 10s CD): flashes owned villagers green, expanding green ring effect. Key: 1.

tickets.title: Implement Storm divine power
tickets.description: Done. Storm (50 belief, 8 tile radius, 30s CD): scatters all villagers in range, red flash. Key: 2.

tickets.title: Implement Food Blessing divine power
tickets.description: Done. Food (30 belief, 10 tile radius, 20s CD): +50 belief, 1.5x speed boost for 10s. Key: 3.

tickets.title: Wire up PowerBar to divine power system
tickets.description: Done. PowerBar.jsx deleted. Powers accessible via keyboard (1/2/3) and dev panel. Targeting circle follows cursor, right-click/ESC cancels. Cooldown display in dev panel.

tickets.title: Create BuildingSystem with placement mode
tickets.description: Done. BuildingSystem with ghost preview, grid snapping, terrain validation, occupied tile tracking. Three types: Farm, House, Wall. Keys F/H/W for placement. Click to place, ESC/right-click to cancel.

tickets.title: Implement Farm building
tickets.description: Done. Farm: 2x2 tiles, costs 30 belief, generates 2 food/sec passively. Renders as brown rectangle with green crop dots.

tickets.title: Implement House building
tickets.description: Done. House: 2x2 tiles, costs 20 belief, +5 pop cap per house. Renders as tan rectangle with dark red roof accent. Pop bonus tracked via BuildingSystem.getPopulationBonus().

tickets.title: Implement land influence and territory system
tickets.description: Done. Buildings restricted to within temple influence radius (60 tiles * level). Influence visualized as colored aura circle around temples. Pop cap includes temple base + house bonus. Territory check in BuildingSystem.isWithinInfluence().

tickets.title: Temple upgrade system
tickets.description: Done. Temples upgrade L1-L5 (costs: 100/250/500/1000 belief). Higher levels increase temple size, influence radius, and pop cap. Select temple + press U to upgrade. Cost shown in info panel.

tickets.title: InfoPanel shows entity details on click
tickets.description: Done. Phaser-native info panel in bottom-right. Click villager: state, position, speed. Click temple: level, pop, upgrade cost. Click building: type, food/pop bonus. Click terrain: biome, passability. Selection ring follows entities.

tickets.title: Implement basic save game with Dexie
tickets.description: Done. SaveSystem uses localStorage (simpler than Dexie). Stores terrain seed, players, temples, buildings, villagers. Auto-save every 60s. Save button in pause menu. Serialization/deserialization via JSON.

tickets.title: Add health to villagers and buildings
tickets.description: Done. Villagers have 100 HP with takeDamage/heal methods. Heal power restores 50 HP, Storm deals 30 damage. Health shown in info panel. Building health not yet implemented.

tickets.title: Add rival AI god (basic)
tickets.description: Done. AIGodSystem with passive belief income (2/sec), building decisions (farms/houses near temple), temple upgrades. AI uses same pathfinding and villager systems. Buildings placed within AI influence radius.

tickets.title: Implement combat between rival villagers
tickets.description: Done. Villagers within 3 tiles of enemies deal 5 damage/sec. Red flash on hit. Below 20% HP: flee to temple. Dead villagers removed from game.

tickets.title: Add minimap
tickets.description: Done. 200px minimap in bottom-right with terrain, temple markers, villager dots, viewport indicator. Click to move camera. Toggle with M. Re-renders every 2 seconds.

tickets.title: Add particle effects for key events
tickets.description: Done. ParticleSystem with runtime-generated circle texture. Effects: worship (golden sparkles), villager spawn (white poof), building placed (dust cloud), divine power cast (colored burst per power), villager death (red burst). Max 20 particles per emitter. Auto-listens for powerCast events.

tickets.title: Add ambient sound and music hooks
tickets.description: Done. AudioSystem with procedural Web Audio API sounds (no asset files). SFX: spawn chime, worship choir, build thud, combat impact, death tone, per-power sounds (heal arpeggio, storm thunder, food chime). Ambient: low drone on musicGain channel. Volume controlled via SettingsScene master/music/SFX sliders.

tickets.title: Settings scene with game options
tickets.description: Done. SettingsScene with draggable sliders for master/music/SFX volume, game speed (0.5-3x), camera sensitivity. Debug toggle. Settings persist to localStorage. ESC to return.

tickets.title: Add villager names and basic identity
tickets.description: Done. 160-word name pool assigned on spawn. Names shown in info panel on click. Loyalty system not yet implemented.

tickets.title: Fog of war
tickets.description: Done. FogOfWarSystem with low-res RenderTexture overlay. Unexplored areas: 85% dark fog. Explored but unowned: 45% fog (terrain visible, enemies hidden). Active influence: fully visible. Enemy villagers, buildings, and temples hidden in fog. Updates every 1 second. Toggle via fogOfWarSystem.setEnabled().

tickets.title: Win/lose conditions and game over screen
tickets.description: Done. Game over screen shows victory/defeat/draw with stats (days survived, population, belief, buildings). Retry and Main Menu buttons. Win/lose conditions in PlayerSystem.checkGameEnd().

tickets.title: Performance: entity pooling and viewport culling
tickets.description: Done. Viewport culling: villagers outside camera view (+100px margin) are hidden. Object pooling not yet implemented. Terrain already uses RenderTexture.

tickets.title: Add dev harness for testing game systems
tickets.description: Done. Dev panel expanded with: Game State section (belief/pop/worship stats, +belief buttons, spawn at temple, game speed 0.5-10x, skip day), Divine Powers section (power selection with cooldown display).

tickets.title: Villager visual improvements: sprites or shapes by state
tickets.description: Done. Villagers show distinct visuals per state: moving (cyan stroke, full opacity), worshipping (gold stroke, pulsing, larger), sleeping (blue stroke, dim, smaller), idle (white stroke, faded). Each player's villagers use their god color.
